title: Flipped Learning-Based Science Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational concepts in science disciplines
context.additional_context: Flipped Learning-Based Science Vocational Training for Practicing Professionals in Smartphone-Centric, Technologically Limited Settings

learning_goals: Learners achieve pre-learning objectives by completing over 90% of online materials provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners collaboratively complete one science problem-solving project with peers during real-time classes.
Achieve an overall satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the flipped learning satisfaction survey at the end of the course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
